I stumbled into Domino about a year ago for the first time on the recommendation of a friend.  I quickly fell in love with many a great thing about the place.  The warm, open, and exciting environment that its steward, Jessica, has built is absolutely fabulous.  You can't help but smile in delight as you watch her creative process.  The cocktails at Domino are special, unique, different.  My favorite is Maui Dog: a gin based beverage with a delicious touch of lavender syrup that is irresistible.  Indeed, I've had so many good experiences at Domino that I held my birthday party there last year!  What an evening, what a place.  If you're in Poble Sec/Raval, I definitely recommend a visit to Domino!
